description: This file provides utility functions for generating unique IDs: 'nanoid' for random IDs of specified length, 'customAlphabet' for generating IDs from a custom alphabet, and 'random' for generating cryptographically strong random bytes. It uses Node.js's 'crypto' module to generate secure random data and implements performance optimizations for speed.

methods.name: random
methods.description: Generates a Promise resolving with cryptographically secure random bytes of specified length.

methods.name: customAlphabet
methods.description: Creates a custom ID generator function based on a provided alphabet and default size.

methods.name: nanoid
methods.description: Generates a unique ID string of specified size using cryptographically secure randomness.
